data.title: Developer Jquery in Magliano Vetere (Salerno)
data.meta_description: Roberto Rizzi, Developer Jquery in Italy, in  Magliano Vetere town in the region of Campania. PHP 5 - MySQL developer. Building template starting from Photoshop .psd format through HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript languages. Customized web sites, e-commerce, web-applications, social integration: chose what is the better for your projects. I work either with PHP framework like CodeIgniter or a mine one and JavaScript framework like JQuery, Mootools, ExtJS
data.text:
Developer Jquery in Magliano Vetere city

Are you seeking a Developer Jquery in the Magliano Vetere city?

I'm Roberto Rizzi and i work like PHP developer since many years on the Italian's territory, in Magliano Vetere city and others nations. Presently i'm working on Milan's province but i can get cooperations also in Magliano Vetere. I can build template HTML (also 5 if you want) and CSS 3 stylesheets starting from .psd Photoshop format.

Animations, customizations etc. are built by JQuery, Mootools, ExtSJ frameworks. It depends from yours needs; all this, also in the city of Magliano Vetere.

I've built a small PHP framework in the years and usually I work with it but often I use also CodeIgniter. Moreover CMS like Joomla, WordPress, Zen-Cart often are good solutions.

Keep in touch me for either a cooperation or any other kind of information. You can also, download my curriculum for look at the entire experience of mine.
